title: How to make a guy laugh - Quora

response.answer_text: Take a walk where he can see you while carrying 3 eggs in each hand. While he is watching, slip on a banana peel. While falling, throw all 6 eggs straight up so that they will all come down and hit you after you have fallen… Guaranteed to make him laugh.

Wait till 5 November, and before you throw him on the bonfire paint a big silly grin on his mask and jiggle him up and down. You will have to do the noises yourself. If you are thoroughly confused a British person will explain this answer to you.
